name: Audio Automaton (Nick Grammatico)
description:
Another game where Nick got to go nuts with sound. I wrote and recorded all of the dialogue in this, I told my professor I was willing to do whatever it takes to get the sound perfect for this game, which included kicking a metal shelf several times. I broke my toe from it.

Welcome to your first day with the world famous Audio Automaton. We are now going to start your.....Um...excuse me for a second here....Yes? What is it?....He did what now?!?!?!....Oh great....Sorry about that, but it looks like our tour is going to be cut short as we already have your first assignment. Please hurry now.
